1.1.name: wordpress/like-it
1.1.description: Like-it allows visitors to just "like" a post instead of commenting, preventing multiple meaningless comments like "that's nice", or providing a faster user experience. The text of the button may be changed in order to suit your purposes better - for example, using "I agree".
